description: Analysis of a 17,000-year-old infant’s remains from southern Italy sheds light on Ice Age ancestry and health. The infant, found in a Puglian cave, was likely around a year old at death and had distinctive traits—brown skin, blue eyes, and curly dark hair. His genome links him to Europe’s Villabruna lineage, suggesting their presence in southern Europe well before the Ice Age’s end. Genetic analysis also revealed a rare heart condition, hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, as a likely cause of death. These findings provide unique insight into Ice Age life and genetic traits.
title: 17,000-Year-Old DNA of Ice Age Infant Reveals Dark Skin, Blue Eyes

description: A new study led by David Ho highlights that rainfall significantly increases the ocean's carbon dioxide absorption by 5% to 7%, adding up to 140 to 190 million metric tons of CO2 annually. This research identifies mechanisms like turbulence, dilution, and wet deposition as key contributors to enhanced carbon uptake. The findings are crucial for improving climate models, especially as rainfall patterns are expected to change with climate change.
title: Rainfall Significantly Boosts Ocean Carbon Dioxide Absorption Rates, Claims New Study

description: Researchers at The Jackson Laboratory, Broad Institute, and Yale University use AI to identify DNA sequences that control gene activation in specific cells. This AI model decodes patterns in DNA regions called cis-regulatory elements (CREs), guiding synthetic DNA switches for cell-specific gene activity. Early testing in animal models showed success in selective gene expression, promising future gene therapies with precise targeting, like liver cells in zebrafish, without affecting other tissues. This method may lead to specialized treatments for genetic conditions, helping advance gene editing and cell-specific therapies.
title: AI Unlocks “DNA Grammar” for Targeted Gene Editing, Enhancing Gene Therapy, and More

description: Astronomers has revealed a rare triple system in the Milky Way consisting of a black hole and two stars, known as V404 Cygni. Located approximately 8,000 light-years away, this system poses new questions about black hole formation, suggesting that they may arise through a less violent "direct collapse" process rather than the expected explosive events. Confirmed by the Gaia space telescope, this finding offers significant insights into the origins of black holes and the complexities of stellar interactions.
title: Astronomers Discover Rare Triple Black Hole System in Milky Way, Challenging Formation Theories

description: Scientists from UiT The Arctic University of Norway have issued a stark warning regarding the impact of melting Arctic sea ice on global ocean circulation patterns. Their recent study highlights that significant inflows of freshwater from melting sea ice into the Nordic Seas have historically led to dramatic cooling in northern Europe. By analysing sediment cores, the researchers found that past periods of Arctic warming resulted in disruptions to ocean currents and temperature distribution. As the Arctic is projected to experience ice-free summers by 2050, these findings raise critical concerns about the future of global weather patterns. In an open letter, numerous climate scientists expressed alarm over the increasing risk of major changes in ocean circulation in the Atlantic, emphasising the potential for devastating and irreversible consequences. This research underscores the delicate balance of the Earth's climate system and the urgent need for further study into these dynamics.
title: Study Warns Melting Arctic Ice Could Disrupt Ocean Currents in Europe

description: Instagram lowers the quality of videos that do not get a lot of views, Instagram Head Adam Mosseri said on Friday. The social media platform’s head executive revealed this during an ask-me-anything (AMA) session held on Instagram Stories. As per him, this applies to all video formats on the platform including Stories, longer videos, and Reels.
title: Instagram Lowers Video Quality of Stories and Reels That Do Not Fetch Views, Says Adam Mosseri

description: ISRO Chairman S Somanath has revealed exciting new timelines for India's space missions. The Gaganyaan mission, set to be India's first manned space flight, is now scheduled for a 2026 launch. Furthermore, the ambitious Chandrayaan-4 mission, aimed at returning lunar samples, is expected to lift off by 2028. With a focus on self-reliance and private sector collaboration, ISRO aims to significantly enhance India's role in the global space economy.
title: Gaganyaan Scheduled for 2026, Chandrayaan-4 to Launch by 2028: ISRO

description: Twins are a captivating subject of study, with two main types: identical and fraternal. Identical twins result from a single fertilised egg splitting, sharing identical DNA. Fraternal twins develop from separate eggs fertilised simultaneously. Their emotional connection often surpasses typical sibling relationships, leading to intriguing dynamics. Understanding twins enriches our appreciation for human diversity and relationships.
title: Understanding Twins: Types, Facts, and the Unique Bonds They Share

description: iMac 24-inch (2024) has been launched with the latest 3nm M4 chip and a 4.5K Retina display. Apple has also announced that the new all-in-one iMac offers support for the latest Apple Intelligence features, which are currently being released to compatible devices in the US.
title: iMac 24-Inch With M4 Chip, 4.5K Retina Display and Apple Intelligence Launched in India

description: Moto G05 and Moto G15 are expected to arrive as successors to the Moto G04 and the Moto G14. A report has shared some key details about both phones, their possible launch timeline, and expected price. Recently, the Moto G15 was also reportedly spotted on Geekbench. Motorola could reveal a launch date soon.
title: Moto G05, Moto G15 Price, Launch Timeline Surface Online

description: iQOO 13 will launch soon in India, the Chinese tech brand reaffirmed on Monday. While an exact launch date is still not available, the company did confirm that it will be available for purchase through Amazon in the country. The iQOO 13 will also boast a dynamic lighting element on the back surrounding the camera island. iQOO 13 is scheduled to launch in China on October 30.
title: iQOO 13 Will Be Available in India via Amazon; to Feature a Halo Light

description: Android 16 could reportedly let third-party app developers access Rich Ongoing Notifications. As per the report, the evidence of the under-development feature was spotted in the latest beta version of Android 15, leading to the speculation that it could be introduced in the next iteration of the operating system (OS). This feature is visually similar to the information iPhone users can see in the Dynamic Island.
title: Android 16 to Reportedly Show Rich Ongoing Notifications Similar to iPhone

description: Google Pixel 10 and Pixel 11 camera and video features have been leaked by a publication, well ahead of their anticipated debut in 2025 and 2026, respectively. These phones could arrive with new photo and video features, including enhancements powered by generative AI technology developed by Google and enabled by its next-generation Tensor chipsets.
title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 11 to Offer Improved Camera and Video Features via Upcoming Tensor Chips: Report

description: Elon Musk, the founder of the artificial intelligence (AI) company xAI, announced a new feature for Grok on Monday. The in-house AI chatbot is now getting image understanding capability that allows it to process and analyse the content in an image. Users can now upload an image and ask the AI questions based on it.
title: Elon Musk’s xAI Introduces Image Understanding Feature to Grok AI

description: Oppo launched a new cross-country warranty service for select devices purchased in India and the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) countries. Oppo's select A series, Reno series and F series smartphones are covered under the new scheme. Starting October 31, customers with eligible Oppo handsets can contact any authorised service centre in India or GCC countries to access free warranty services and system upgrades.
title: Oppo Announces Cross-Country Warranty Service Between GCC Countries and India

description: Samsung Galaxy A56 may launch soon as a successor to the Galaxy A55, which was introduced in India in March. The purported smartphone was previously spotted on benchmarking and certification sites that suggested the chipset, OS and RAM details of the phone. A new report has now surfaced online that hints at the camera hardware on the Galaxy A56.
title: Samsung Galaxy A56 Camera Details Surface Online; Said to Get 50-Megapixel Main Rear Camera

description: Honor will unveil the Magic 7 series on October 30. Ahead of the launch, new rumours surrounding the series are surfacing on the Web. Most recently, hands-on images of the Honor Magic 7 Pro emerged online showcasing the phone's design and specifications. The alleged renders suggest a quad-camera setup on the rear. The Magic 7 Pro seems to have a dual selfie camera unit.
title: Honor Magic 7 Pro Leaked Hands-on Images Show Quad Rear Cameras, Pill-Shaped Display Cutout

description: JioSaavn — the music-streaming platform owned by Jio Platforms — is rolling out an offer ahead of the festive season. Users will be able to avail of three months of free JioSaavn Pro subscription at no cost, enabling them to stream ad-free music and enjoy unlimited downloads of the highest quality. However, the offer is only limited to select subscription plans.
title: JioSaavn Introduces 3-Month Free ‘Pro Individual’ Subscription Ahead of Festive Season

description: HMD Sage could be the next smartphone from the Finnish OEM. Key details of the purported handset have surfaced online. This includes a leaked design render which suggests that the smartphone will likely be a slightly altered version of the HMD Skyline, which launched in India in September. Several key features of the rumoured model have been tipped as well.
title: HMD Sage Tipped to Be Company's Next Phone; Design, Key Features Leaked

description: The recently released Tata Curvv EV starts at a price of Rs. 17.49 lakh and comes in three exciting variants. These variants are Creative, Accomplished and Empowered Plus.
title: Tata Curvv EV Variants Explained: Price in India, Features, Specifications, and More

description: iPhone SE 4 specifications and pricing details have been leaked by a tipster, and the fourth-generation iPhone SE is expected to feature a 6.06-inch OLED display. It is expected to arrive with the Apple A18 chip, the same one that powers the iPhone 16, and it may be the first Apple phone to include a proprietary modem designed by Apple.
title: iPhone SE 4 Tipped to Arrive With 6.06-inch LTPS OLED Screen, 3,279mAh Battery and Apple's In-House Modem

description: Amidst the ever growing competition in China, Companies like BYD and other manufacturers are investing heavily in European plants.
title: BYD and other Chinese Manufacturers Reportedly Looking to Double Overseas Capacity

description: iQOO Neo 10 and iQOO Neo 10 Pro are said to be in the works as a successor to iQOO Neo 9 and Neo 9 Pro, respectively. While the Vivo sub-brand is close-mouthed about the arrival of the new Neo phones, a Chinese tipster has posted about their launch timeframe. The vanilla iQOO Neo 10 is expected to run on Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, while the iQOO Neo 10 Pro could be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Series Launch Timeframe Leaked; May Arrive Earlier Than Its Predecessor

description: Xiaomi is gearing up to launch several products on October 29 in China including the Xiaomi 15 series, Pad 7 tablet lineup, and HyperOS 2.0. Now, the company has confirmed that it will also unveil the Xiaomi Watch S4 and Xiaomi Smart Band 9 Pro on the same day. Xiaomi has also revealed the first look of the upcoming smart wearables via teaser posters. Some of their key features have been confirmed as well.
title: Xiaomi Watch S4, Smart Band 9 Pro to Launch on October 29 Alongside Xiaomi 15 Series

description: Google is reportedly working on an artificial intelligence (AI) system that can control users’ Web browsers to complete certain tasks. As per the report, the new technology is codenamed Project Jarvis and is similar to the Computer Use tool released by Anthropic last week. However, unlike taking over the entire PC of a user, the Mountain View-based tech giant’s offering is said to only focus on executing tasks within the browser.
title: Google Project Jarvis AI Tool That Can Control Web Browser Said to Release in December

description: Apple rolled out the iOS 18.2 Developer Beta 1 update for iPhone last week. It introduced Image Playground, Image Wand and Genmoji, expanding the suite of Apple Intelligence features that it first debuted with the iOS 18.1 beta. However, a large number of users have been unable to take advantage of them due to Apple requiring early access registration, which is yet to be granted.
title: Apple Confirms Early Access to Image Playground, Other Apple Intelligence Features Rolling Out in ‘Coming Weeks’

description: Apple has been blocked from selling its latest iPhones in Indonesia, as the company is yet to meet local investment requirements. The iPhone 16, can't be sold in the country as PT Apple Indonesia hasn't fulfilled the country's 40 percent domestic content requirements for smartphones and tablets, according to Indonesia's Ministry of Industry.
title: iPhone 16 Series Sales in Indonesia Blocked Over Unmet Investment Requirements

description: SonyLIV's new anthology series, Zindaginama, premiered on 10 October 2024. The series features six standalone episodes that explore human relationships through relatable narratives. With a strong cast including Prajakta Koli and Shreyas Talpade, Zindaginama offers an authentic portrayal of life’s ups and downs. Critics have responded positively, highlighting the show's emotional depth and compelling performances. Viewers can enjoy this fresh take on storytelling, which is available exclusively on SonyLIV.
title: Zindaginama OTT Release: SonyLIV’s New Anthology Series Explores Human Connections

description: Meta released a new open-source artificial intelligence (AI) tool on Sunday that will take on the Google NotebookLM. Dubbed NotebookLlama, the tool is an AI-powered podcast generator where users can upload a PDF file and the tool will turn it into an audio podcast with two AI characters. The tool uses three different Llama 3.1 AI models to complete the entire process.
title: Meta NotebookLlama AI Podcast Generator Released as ‘Open Source Tool' to Take on Google's NotebookLM

description: Ultraviolette is confident that the Indian consumers will surely accommodate electric two-wheelers . They are present in many Indian cities and are planning to export to Europe too in the coming time.
title: Ultraviolette F77 Mach 2 Might Soon Launch in Europe, Pricing Revealed

description: TSMC is said to have halted shipments to the China-based company Sophgo following the discovery of its chip in a Huawei AI processor. Huawei faces restrictions on purchasing such technology to safeguard U.S. national security. The means by which the chip was incorporated into the Huawei product remains undetermined by Reuters.
title: TSMC Said to Suspend Shipments to China Firm After Chip Found on Huawei AI Processor

description: Chinese biologists have discovered how a newly found tardigrade species, Hypsibius henanensis, can endure extreme radiation levels. Researchers identified three unique mechanisms that support this resilience: a TRID1 protein enabling DNA repair, mitochondrial proteins that enhance cellular defense, and high antioxidant production. This discovery enhances our understanding of molecular resilience and could inform advances in DNA repair therapies and radiation protection
title: New Tardigrade Species Hypsibius henanensis Reveals Unique Radiation Survival Mechanisms

description: Itel S25 series may launch soon as details regarding the purported lineup have surfaced online over the past few days. The series is expected to include a base Itel S25 and an S25 Ultra variant. A new report has shared leaked promotional posters of the Itel S25 Ultra as well as some hands-on images of the phone. The leaked materials suggest key specifications of the handset, and its possible price.
title: Itel S25 Ultra Hands-On Images Surface Online; Price, Key Features Tipped

description: Indian carmaker, Tata launched Tata Tiago EV in September 2022. India’s one of the safest and most reliable hatchbacks recently crossed 50,000 units delivery.
title: Tata Tiago EV Surpasses Milestone of 50,000 Units Delivery Since Launch

description: iQOO 13 is all set to launch on October 30 in China. With the launch date nearing, there's no shortage of teasers and rumours surrounding the flagship phone. Most recently, there has been chatter about the upcoming smartphone's pricing, and it looks like it will cost more than its predecessor — iQOO 12. The iQOO 13 is confirmed to come with a 7.99mm thick build.
title: iQOO 13 Teased to Measure 7.99mm in Thickness; Confirmed to See Price Hike

description: Union Information and Broadcasting Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw met with Meta's Chief AI Scientist, Yann LeCun, on Saturday, to explore opportunities in artificial intelligence.  India's AI Mission has fostered strong collaborations between industry, government, and academia, the minister said in a post on X.
title: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw Meets Meta's Chief AI Scientist to Discuss Opportunities in Artificial Intelligence

description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 released on October 25 across PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Xbox Series S/X. The first-person shooter also became the first Call of Duty title in history to be available on Xbox Game Pass on the day of launch. Analysts believe the newest Call of Duty could reportedly add up to four million new subscribers to Game Pass.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 on Game Pass Could Add Up to 4 Million New Subscribers to Service, Analysts Say

description: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has released an advisory outlining the duties of social media platforms, also known as intermediaries, in preventing the spread of hoax bomb threats by various airlines operating in India. The necessity for these intermediaries to adhere to the IT Act, the IT Rules of 2021, and the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) of 2023, was also stressed by MeitY.
title: Government Issues Advisory to Curb Hoax Bomb Threats on Social Media

description: Xiaomi SU7 Ultra was first unveiled in July as the company’s latest prototype electric vehicle (EV). The Chinese company, which is primarily a maker of consumer-centric devices like smartphones and tablets, delved into the automotive industry earlier this year with the launch of the Xiaomi SU7. After months of testing, Xiaomi SU7 Ultra is all set to make its debut in China this week.
title: Xiaomi SU7 Ultra With HyperEngine V8s Electric Motors to Debut on October 29: Everything We Know

description: OpenAI released an artificial intelligence (AI) tool dubbed Whisper in 2022, which can transcribe speech to text. However, a report claimed that the AI tool is prone to hallucinations and is adding imaginary text in transcriptions. This is concerning as the tool is said to be used in several high-risk industries such as medicine and accessibility.
title: OpenAI’s Transcription Tool Reportedly Adding Hallucinated Content in Medical Consultation Records

description: A supernova recorded in 1181, known as SN 1181, has been linked to the Pa 30 nebula, revealing a rare “zombie star.” Advanced 3D imaging from the Keck Observatory has shown unusual filaments expanding from this star, marking it as a unique case in supernova studies. This zombie star survived a thermonuclear explosion on a white dwarf, challenging prior beliefs about the fate of such stars. Researchers emphasize the significance of these findings for understanding supernovae and cosmic evolution.
title: Supernova SN 1181 Reveals Rare “Zombie Star” in Pa 30 Nebula

description: Aubrey Plaza’s latest film, My Old Ass, presents a unique take on the coming-of-age genre. Premiering at the Sundance Film Festival on January 20, 2024, the story follows Elliott, an 18-year-old who, while celebrating her birthday with friends, encounters her older self during a psychedelic experience. Played by Plaza, Elliott’s 39-year-old self shares candid, often humorous advice, forcing young Elliott to reconsider her choices about life, love, and family. Directed by Megan Park and produced by Amazon MGM Studios, My Old Ass received a limited U.S. release in September 2024 and is now playing in select theaters.
title: My Old Ass OTT Release Date: Aubrey Plaza’s Starrer Movie to Stream on Prime Video in November

description: Reception to Starfield, Bethesda's action-RPG that launched in 2013, has been mixed. A former designer at the studio has said that a potential Starfield sequel would be "one hell of a game".
title: Starfield 2 Will 'One Hell of a Game', Former Bethesda Designer Says

description: Sathyam Sundaram, directed by C. Prem Kumar, brings together Karthi and Arvind Swamy in a heartwarming story of rediscovery and hidden connections. The film, released on September 28, focuses on subtle emotions, relationships, and the nostalgia of revisiting the past. While praised for its realistic portrayal and strong performances, the slow pace may not appeal to all viewers. Overall, it’s a movie that captures the essence of rural life and human connections through understated storytelling and simple dialogues.
title: Sathyam Sundaram OTT Release Date: Karthi, Arvind Swamy Starrer Telugu Drama Movie Now Streaming on Netflix

description: Rajinikanth’s much-anticipated film, Vettaiyan, which has grossed nearly ₹250 crore since its theatrical release on 10 October, is speculated to premiere on Amazon Prime Video on 7 November. With its streaming rights reportedly sold for ₹90 crore, the film explores the complexities of justice and police encounters. Directed by T.J. Gnanavel, Vettaiyan features a stellar cast, including Amitabh Bachchan and Fahadh Faasil. Fans are eagerly awaiting confirmation as the movie continues its successful run in theatres.
title: Rajinikanth’s Vettaiyan Expected to Premiere on Amazon Prime Video This November

description: SonyLIV's new anthology series, Zindaginama, premiered on 10 October 2024. The series features six standalone episodes that explore human relationships through relatable narratives. With a strong cast including Prajakta Koli and Shreyas Talpade, Zindaginama offers an authentic portrayal of life’s ups and downs. Critics have responded positively, highlighting the show's emotional depth and compelling performances. Viewers can enjoy this fresh take on storytelling, which is available exclusively on SonyLIV.
title: Zindaginama OTT Release: SonyLIV’s New Anthology Series Explores Human Connections

description: Prime Video’s latest spy thriller, Citadel: Honey Bunny, immerses viewers in a world of secrets and suspense. With an action-packed trailer, a talented cast, and high-stakes espionage, this series is set to intrigue audiences globally. Discover release details, cast, plot, and initial reception for Citadel: Honey Bunny, and dive into Prime Video’s exciting new spy saga.
title: Citadel: Honey Bunny OTT Release Date: Here's Everything You Need to Know About Varun Dhawan, Samantha Ruth Prabhu Starrer Series

description: Xiaomi 15 series is expected to launch in China tomorrow (Tuesday) as the company’s next-generation flagship phones, comprised of two models — Xiaomi 15 and Xiaomi 15 Pro. Ahead of their impending debut, a company official has confirmed several specifications of both devices, including the presence of a 5X telephoto camera and 6,100mAh battery on the Xiaomi 15 Pro.
title: Xiaomi 15 Pro to Come With 5X Periscope Camera, 6,100mAh Battery; Key Specifications Confirmed

description: Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Design was launched by the company in September as the world’s first mass-market triple foldable smartphone, although it is only available in China (as of now). It comes with three screens that can be folded in a Z-style manner. However, a recent durability test of the smartphone carried out by a popular YouTuber suggests that the displays might be more susceptible to scratching compared to standard smartphones.
title: Huawei Mate XT Ultimate Design Could be Easily Susceptible to Scratches, Durability Test Suggests

description: Realme GT 7 Pro will launch in China on November 4. The phone will be powered by Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The handset has now once again surfaced on the Geekbench benchmarking site with improved test scores. Meanwhile, some of the key features of the phone have been spotted on a certification site. The company has already revealed the design and colour options of the upcoming smartphone.
title: Realme GT 7 Pro Spotted on Geekbench Again With Higher Scores; MIIT Listing Suggests Key Features

description: OnePlus 13 will be unveiled in China on October 31. Recent Weibo posts confirm the battery size and charging capabilities of the OnePlus 12 successor. The OnePlus 13 will get a big battery upgrade compared to its predecessor. Like its predecessor, the upcoming handset will support 100W wired and 50W wireless charging.
title: OnePlus 13 Battery, Charging Specifications Detailed in New Teasers Ahead of October 31 Launch

description: Apple could be developing a smart display that could be used to control smart home devices, according to details shared by Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. It is said to feature a compact display supported by a circular base, that could resemble Apple's older iMac models, and run on a new operating system.
title: Apple Smart Home Display With Square-Shaped Screen, iMac G4-Like Base in Development: Gurman

description: Google has rolled out a new update for Quick Share for the Windows platform that does not bundle any new features but carries bug fixes for several issues that have been plaguing users in recent weeks. The new version of Quick Share rectifies an error which caused the app to crash if the file had a name comprising of non-ASCII characters.
title: Google Rolls Out Quick Share Update for Windows With App Crashing, Wi-Fi Hotspot Recovery Fixes
